events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer role from the candidate and will begin our review shortly.
The candidate's application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on the provided experience in software development.
Assigned recruiter James Thompson to manage the screening and interview process for the software engineering candidate.
Initial phone screening completed; the candidate demonstrated solid understanding of backend and frontend software engineering principles.
Received positive response from candidate confirming availability for the technical interview scheduled next week.
Scheduled a technical interview with senior engineering team for the candidate on 2024-05-10 at 10:00 AM UTC.
